message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value related to cash payments for acquiring property, plant and equipment, and other long-term assets.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see the "Cash Flow from Investing Activities" section which typically contains these types of expenditures.

Within this section, there is a line item "Purchase of Fixed Assets" with an amount of 1726015.08. This represents the cash paid to acquire property, plant and equipment during the period.

This is the value I need to extract as it represents the cash payments to acquire long-term assets.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1726015.08'} }
```
